name: Regular Spacecraft: Defending the Mothership
description:
Note: This is a Demo, the game is still under development.

Plot: You must prevent enemies from passing through the Mothership. Shoot the enemies to defeat them, collect gems to buy upgrades, upgrade your Spacecraft and teh Mothership to win the battle.

Keyboard: WASD or Arrows to move, F or Space Bar to fire, Esc or P for pause, Esc to close power ups menu.

Gamepad: D-Pad or Left Stick to move, X or R2 to fire, Start to pause, B to close power ups menu.

Tech stack: TypeScript + Angry Pixel Engine
